statements: DELETE FROM abandoned_carts WHERE user_id = 100 AND abandoned_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM abandoned_carts WHERE user_id = 100 AND abandoned_at < NOW();
DELETE FROM abandoned_carts WHERE customer_id = 10 AND total_amount < 100.00;
DELETE FROM abandoned_carts WHERE cart_id = 101 AND customer_id = 201;
DELETE FROM CartItems WHERE cart_id = 200 AND item_id = 15;
DELETE FROM CartItems WHERE price > 100 AND cart_id NOT IN (SELECT cart_id FROM AbandonedCarts WHERE abandoned_at < '2021-01-01');
DELETE FROM cart_items WHERE cart_id = 10 AND product_id = 5;
